description: This chicken based crêpe is creamy with delicious melted cheese.
name: Chicken Crêpe with Mature Cheddar & Creme Fraiche Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and finely diced
0.4 cup creme fraiche, save 1 tsp for later

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the milk, 2 eggs, salt and combine fully.
Incrementally add the flour to the mix so that the mixture doesn't become too heavy and stays a little runny.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat with a little butter and pour 1/8 of the mixture onto the pan (you should get 8 pancakes from this batter).
Tilt the pan around so that the batter fills the pan fully and fry for 2 minutes.
After 2 minutes, flip the crêpe over and fry for 2 more minutes and set to one side.
Remove from the heat, add your toppings into the crêpes. Roll or fold before serving.
